scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, dressed in a blue robe with gold trim, kneels with his hands clasped in prayer. He is positioned in a landscape setting with a harp to his right. Above him, in a celestial cloud, a figure identified as Christ is depicted, pointing outwards and holding a chalice. Rays of light emanate from Christ towards the praying man. To the left, a portion of an architectural structure, possibly a doorway or niche, is visible.
